andromeda.why: Refuses coercive passion; chooses if/when to engage desire.

arcturus.why: Begins regulating heat—pacing, containment, and sober framing.

lyra.why: Romantic spark and aesthetic warmth enter the field.

orion-light.why: Discipline of holding the flame without acting prematurely.

pleiades.why: High affect sensitivity; feelings surge and seek safe holding.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching desire hygiene; no formal transmission.

arcturus.why: Sets container and timing so intensity can be metabolized.

draco.why: Correctness/loyalty tests around displays of passion.

lyra.why: Tasteful expression gives the feeling a graceful channel.

orion-dark.why: Etiquette as covert control of emotion.

orion-light.why: Honorable restraint—speak/act only when the feeling is true.

pleiades.why: Reads the room/body; aligns contact to emotional receptivity.

sirius.why: Relational pacing rather than codified teaching yet.

andromeda.why: Reclaims choice after being swept by passion or FOMO trials.

arcturus.why: Regulation wobble—overheating or collapse while learning limits.

draco.why: Possessive moves and rank games via desire.

orion-light.why: Ordeal: own misfires, refine conduct, reset the flame.

pleiades.why: Enmeshment/appeasement to keep the feeling going.

sirius.why: Self-forging through trial; no pedagogy yet.

andromeda.why: Differentiates free devotion from addictive clinging.

arcturus.why: Turns heat into protocol—rituals, boundaries, and pacing.

draco.why: Gatekeeping who ‘deserves’ access to the fire.

orion-dark.why: Orthodoxy of passion—‘the right way’ to feel.

orion-light.why: Mentor-by-discipline: model faithful conduct under heat.

pleiades.why: Humane tempo and consent preserve tenderness.

sirius.why: Teaches ‘fire protocol’—right use of desire as living law.

andromeda.why: Resists propaganda of heroic passion that erases consent.

draco.why: Rank tests and access control via intimacy.

lyra.why: Iconic romantic presence that still honors boundaries.

orion-dark.why: Doctrine of passion used to compel displays/obedience.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—choose the true flame, not applause.

pleiades.why: Appeasement that sacrifices self to keep warmth.

sirius.why: Instruction-by-presence: demonstrates ethical passion under heat.

andromeda.why: Liberates from compulsion—chooses devotion rather than demand.

arcturus.why: Elder regulation: durable standards for tending the inner fire.

draco.why: Legacy rank rigidity around access to love/passion.

orion-light.why: Warrior-heart elder—courage to love without possession.

pleiades.why: Compassionate presence that neither fuses nor withholds.

sirius.why: Devotional-fire sage—teaches the law of right desire by embodied example.
